description:
We are a thriving real estate company seeking exceptional sales talent for our growing team. We are offering an exciting and prosperous commission based compensation plan, benefits package, and a high energy atmosphere with exceptional opportunities to learn and grow with us.

If you’re an outstanding sales professional interested in leveraging your sales talents in a role that gives you greater freedom, flexibility, control and much greater earning potential, consider joining our top-performing sales team… in real estate sales.

Compensation: $132,500 at plan earnings
